education.title: Education Sources
education.financialLiteracyDesc: Financial literacy is the ability to understand and effectively use various financial skills. It includes understanding how money works, how to manage it, and how to invest it wisely.
education.budgetingDesc: Budgeting is the process of creating a plan to manage your money. It involves tracking income and expenses, setting financial goals, and making adjustments to ensure you live within your means.
education.investmentGuidesDesc: Investment guides provide insights into different types of investments, how to evaluate them, and how to build a diversified portfolio. They are essential for making informed investment decisions.

hero.subtitle: Unlock the power of financial literacy to take control of your future.

content.whyItMattersText: Financial literacy equips you with the knowledge and skills to manage your finances effectively. It empowers you to make informed decisions, plan for the future, and build a secure financial foundation.

concepts.managingFinancesDesc: Learn how to budget, save, and spend wisely.
concepts.creditAndDebtDesc: Know how to manage credit scores and avoid excessive debt.
concepts.investingGrowthDesc: Discover how to invest in stocks, bonds, and other assets to grow your wealth.

content.finalText: Embrace financial literacy to make smarter financial choices, secure your future, and achieve your financial goals. Start your journey today and transform your financial well-being!

hero.title: Master the Art of Budgeting
hero.subtitle: Create a financial plan that helps you achieve your goals and stay in control of your money.

content.whyBudgetingText: Budgeting is a powerful tool that helps you manage your finances effectively. It allows you to track your income and expenses, ensuring you stay within your means and work towards your financial goals. By creating and sticking to a budget, you can avoid unnecessary debt, save for future needs, and achieve financial stability.
content.finalText: Implementing a budget helps you make informed financial decisions, stay disciplined, and achieve your long-term financial goals. Start budgeting today and take control of your financial future!

calculateIncome.title: Calculate Your Monthly Income
calculateIncome.description: Determine all sources of income, including salary, bonuses, and other earnings, to understand your total available funds.

listExpenses.title: List Your Expenses
listExpenses.description: Track all your spending, including fixed costs like rent and variable costs like groceries, to identify areas where you can save.

setGoals.title: Set Your Financial Goals
setGoals.description: Define clear, achievable financial goals such as saving for a vacation, paying off debt, or building an emergency fund.

adjustSpending.title: Adjust Your Spending
adjustSpending.description: Review your spending habits and adjust them to align with your budget and financial goals. Cut back on non-essential expenses and prioritize savings.
